author: Special Correspondent
text:
Visually challenged people submitted a petition to the district administration on Monday seeking free bus pass in booklet form. According to a delegation, the bus pass in booklet form, provided in other districts, was easier to handle. They urged the Erode district administration to take prompt steps for the same.

Their petition also contained demands such as provision of smart foldable canes twice a year, braille watches, adherence to reservation of seats in buses, and land pattas.
title: Petition submitted
